title: Ferne McCann turns heads in a plunging crop top and shorts as she braves the cold in London
text:
The temperature in London has plummeted in recent weeks.

Yet that didn't stop Ferne McCann from dressing to impress as she stepped out in a crop top and shorts to TV studios on Monday.

Ensuring all eyes would be on her, the former TOWIE star, 29, showcased her tanned and toned figure on the outing.

Glamorous: The temperature in London has plummeted. Yet that didn't stop Ferne McCann from dressing to impress as she stepped out in a crop top and shorts to TV studios on Monday

Ferne put her cleavage on display in a low-cut bralet that also exposed her enviably taut stomach.

She teamed the garment with a pair of matching high waisted shorts, whilst she layered up with a teddy bear coat.

Ferne completed the glamour with a pair of heeled white boots and accessorised with a mini bucket bag.

All eyes on her: Ensuring all eyes would be on her, the former TOWIE star, 29, showcased her tanned and toned figure on the outing

The First Time Mum star's outing comes as it's been reported that her former TOWIE co-star Nicole Bass had visited her acid attacker ex Arthur Collins in prison.

It's said that Nicole, 27, visited Arthur in Whitemoor prison in Cambridgeshire on Thursday.

Arthur is serving a 20 year sentence for an acid attack in a nightclub in April 2017.

Ferne, who dumped him as soon as she discovered what he did, was pregnant with their child at the time, going on to give birth to daughter Sunday in November that year.

Legs eleven! She teamed the garment with a pair of matching high waisted shorts, whilst she layered up with a teddy bear coat

All about the accessories: erne completed the glamour with a pair of heeled white boots and accessorised with a mini bucket bag

A source told The Sun on Sunday: 'Nicole and Arthur have known each other for a long time.

'Before Arthur was convicted they moved in similar circles in Essex. The fact that Nicole has gone all the way to Whitemoor speaks volumes.

'Arthur has a long time left to serve but it is clear he is staying close to his old pals whilst behind bars.'

Visit: The First Time Mum star's outing comes as it's been reported that her former TOWIE co-star Nicole Bass had visited her acid attacker ex Arthur Collins in prison

Arthur was even a support to Nicole when her home was ransacked by robbers and her car was stolen in June 2017.

Ferne no longer has anything to do with Arthur and instead is focusing on herself and her daughter.

ITVBe recently announced that Ferne McCann: First Time Mum would return for its fourth series in the autumn for a three episode run.

The series will offer another intimate behind-the-scenes look at Ferne's life and journey as a single-parent as her daughter Sunday approaches the 'terrible twos.
